TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
This is my home - Ylarie. This is what I wanted you to see.
This is my home - Ylarie. This is what I wanted you to see.
This is my home - Ylarie. This is what I wanted you to see.
This is my home - Ylarie. This is what I wanted you to see.
But... it's in ruins!
But... it's in ruins!
But... it's in ruins!
But... it's in ruins!
Ylarie has been in ruins for over a thousand years. But Ylarie is where we now live. It is the only place, apart from the Citadel of Ehlariel where we are safe.
Ylarie has been in ruins for over a thousand years. But Ylarie is where we now live. It is the only place, apart from the Citadel of Ehlariel where we are safe.

You mean Bane has invaded here, too?
You mean Bane has invaded here, too?
You mean Bane has invaded here, too?
You mean Bane has invaded here, too?

Skullguard Keep has fallen. Iceguard Keep will soon fall as well. We have held those passes for 500 years, but we could not stand before the creatures he sent at us this time. This is our last line of defense.

Skullguard Keep has fallen. Iceguard Keep will soon fall as well. We have held those passes for 500 years, but we could not stand before the creatures he sent at us this time. This is our last line of defense.

I'll help your people any way that I can, but we must get into the Realms of Death.
I'll help your people any way that I can, but we must get into the Realms of Death.
I'll help your people any way that I can, but we must get into the Realms of Death.
I'll help your people any way that I can, but we must get into the Realms of Death.

You do not understand. You have no reason to go into the Realms of Death. You came to rescue your people, but Lord Bane has turned them into the Undead army that defeated us. There is nobody for you to rescue - they are all gone. And any metal he took from you was forged into their weapons.

You do not understand. You have no reason to go into the Realms of Death. You came to rescue your people, but Lord Bane has turned them into the Undead army that defeated us. There is nobody for you to rescue - they are all gone. And any metal he took from you was forged into their weapons.

What about vengeance? Isn't that a good enough reason?
What about vengeance? Isn't that a good enough reason?
What about vengeance? Isn't that a good enough reason?
What about vengeance? Isn't that a good enough reason?
Vengeance is all we have left. But soon Ylarie will fall. And then Ehlariel will fall. After that, vengeance will be a long forgotten dream...
